name: My Body Coach 2: Fitness & Dance
overview: Whether you want to be coached by Valérie Orsoni, or prefer to create your own fitness sessions by choosing from over 130 different exercises, My Body Coach 2 offers you a complete diet and fitness program that you can do at home. Besides the sports coach, you will also benefit from nutritional advice in 170 detailed menus. Use the Wii remote, which you integrate into the weights supplied with the game, to enable the virtual coach to tell you how to correct your moves in real time in Fitness and Gym Dance. Follow the diet and exercise program which most suits your needs, and have fun as you sculpt your dream body! Featuring: - 5 objectives: lose weight, keep in shape, tone up, develop your muscles, relax. - 2 x 500g weights supplied with the game. - Your virtual coach will correct your moves in real time in Fitness and in Gym. - Dance using the Wii Remote that you integrate into the weights supplied with the game. - Let your coach guide you in your personalized program, or create your own fitness sessions. - 130 exercises and 170 healthy, well balanced menus. - New Gym Dance mode which can be played by two players simultaneously. - The game is compatible with Wii Motion Plus.
